__DOCUMENTATION__: This is the configuration file for Cici.
auto_reload_config - [true/false] Force cici to automatically reload this config every 10 seconds
silent - [true/false] don't show errors and don't output to stdout.
custom_prefixes - [true/false] enable custom per-user and per-server prefixes
dont_auto_load - [true/false] do not automatically load extensions from ./Modules
hush_jishaku - [true/false] hide and silence the jishaku development and debugging cog
log_to_file - [true/false] save stdout/stderr output to a text file. By default saves to ./debug.log
log_level - [String, ERROR/DEBUG] set the logging.logger level. The DEBUG setting can cause performance issues
bot_token - (*REQUIRED*)[String] Discord bot token. Can be found at https://discord.com/developers/applications
extra_modules - [Array] List of extra modules/extensions to add on boot
max_prefix_length - [Integer] Maximum character limit for custom prefixes. Does not apply to default prefixes
embed_color - [Integer] Default embed color. Hexadecimal values must be converted to a base-10 integer first
